channel.title: suggestions anyone? arma2 problem
channel.description:
So I decided to jump on the DayZ bandwagon and buy Arma2 with Combined operations, I looked around for a cheap option having missed the steam sale and got it from a cdkey site that provides a download to the game after purchase. problem is its been cut into pieces, 12 pieces in fact. so thinking fuck that! i went and torrented a copy thinking during the installation id be able to input my key, but no. this genius made it to crack the game during the installation and negate all the DRM. Anyone have any idea where to get a full download of the full game with all the security bits intact?
oh, and it's not a steam copy of the game so activating it in steam wont work. before anyone suggests that. :'(

item.title: suggestions anyone? arma2 problem
item.dc:creator: Toxicitate
item.description:
Yeah, To be honest I took a leap of faith with this site. It seemed legit, but there were a few things that didn’t look right. From their FAQ for Example;

What to do when I’m not satisfied with your service?
Send us an E-mail stating the reason why you aint satisfied

but the key checks out okay, and I got it for a good 10 dollars cheaper then everywhere else, but definitely not using the service again. ha

Read full topic

item.title: suggestions anyone? arma2 problem
item.dc:creator: MDIGN
item.description:
Sorry but, you’re going to have to download the 12 Parts. All the torrents are cracked, I would upload my stuff, but it’s steam version.

-Cheap CD-Key Pro-tips:-
A.) Certain games should not be bought from CD-Key retailers (ARMA II)
B.) Only buy from 100% legit ones.
C.) PM me if a site seems “fishy”

Read full topic
